column1: The  accused-appellant  was  indicted  in  the  High  Court  of  Chilaw  on  three

column2: Having committed the murder of one Arumugam Kuwendran on the 16th
of July 2005, an offence punishable under section 296 of the Penal Code.
Having  attempted  to  murder  M.M.  Jayasiri  on  the  same  day,  an  offence
punishable under section 300 of the Penal Code.
Being in possession of a gun, an offence punishable under section 22 (3)
of the Firearms Ordinance as amended by Act No 22 of 1996.
